title: FSX VC Rain Fix
description:
Some addon aircraft in FSX have a problem in the virtual cockpit when it rains, the screen turns blue.

If you get the VCRain textures from FS2004 and place them into FSX the problem is fixed. You even get the raindrops back. 

This is a self installer that places the FS2004 files into FSX

I have included a backup folder with the original FSX VCRain textures in it if you decide to go back to the default.

Remember... use at your own risk
